requirement.en: Equip this card to 1 face-up Fairy Type monster on your field with 0 original ATK and DEF.

effect.en: The equipped monster and face-down cards in your Spell & Trap Zone cannot be destroyed by your opponent's card effects. While the equipped monster is face-up on your field, your opponent cannot declare an attack on monsters that are not equipped with an Equip Spell Card.
